txt.en: Instance: Mistaken Identity
Protect Egwylf and Willem from the Nazgûl
Talk to Egwylf
'This storm sprang up most suddenly, [placeholder]! We should look for a place to take some shelter from the rain and the wind!\n\n'I am quite nervous about this lightning, too!'
DNT - Blah!
A Nazgûl has descended upon the plains of Rohan, and Bingo is in danger!
'We have to find Bingo, [placeholder]. That creature may come back!'
Egwylf thinks you might be able to drive away the Nazgûl if you can set the grass afire.
'Let us search for Bingo before this storm gets any worse!'
DNT - Blah!
The Nazgûl hisses angrily. It does not wish to get close to the flames!
The Nazgûl has fled.
As you travel across the plains of Rohan with Bingo, Egwylf, and Willem Whisker, a fierce storm has arisen and troubled your passage.
'I will be glad when this storm passes!'
You have been caught out in the storm with Bingo, Egwylf, and Willem.
'What is that sound?'
'Tanglemane, wait! We cannot leave them behind!'
The rain and the wind has become very intense, and Bingo wants to find a sheltered place to stay.
'Sssooo far from Shire...'
'Bagginssss!'
Look for a place to shelter from the storm
'Bagginsss...'
Protect Bingo from the Nazgûl
'Ssssss....'
'Bingo! You have to get out of here!'
Pick up the torch from the ground where it has fallen
'Tanglemane! Take Bingo and go!'
'[placeholder]! The beast fears fire!'
'Take this torch and set the grass ablaze!'
'Away with you! This is no place for the likes of you!'
'Bingo! Bingo?'
'Tanglemane bore him to safety... but also beyond ear-shot!'
Set the grass on fire
Talk to Bingo before the storm gets worse
The flame catches!
You need to grab the torch in order to set the grass on fire!
'Baggins? I believe you have made a mistake!'
'I am a Boffin! Bingo Boffin!'
